title: Responses of CO₂ and CH₄ in the alpine wetlands of the Tibetan Plateau to warming and nitrogen and phosphorus additions
content:
Environ. Sci.: Processes Impacts, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EM00174E, Paper
Wenbao Zhang, Huijuan Xin, Zongxing Li, Qiao Cui, Bing Xu, Yaning Wang , Biao Tang, Chong Xu, Jian Xue
Wetlands, as one of the vital global ecosystems, store substantial amounts of carbon. However, climate change and human activities have led to the influx of exogenous nutrients like nitrogen and...
